title: 111_hr5333
content: The "Children of Military Service Members Commemorative Lapel Pin Act" is the short title of the Act. The Department of Defense will recognize dependent children of members of the Armed Forces. The Act establishes a lapel button for eligible children of military service members serving on active duty for over 30 days. The button design and eligibility will be approved by the Secretary of Defense.
